      • retrieveAppUsageGivenCriteria

        public static java.util.ArrayList<AppUsage> retrieveAppUsageGivenCriteria(java.lang.String year,
                                                                          java.lang.String school,
                                                                          java.lang.String gender,
                                                                          java.lang.String date,
                                                                          java.sql.Connection conn)
        Retrieve an ArrayList of AppUsage by given specific criteria of year, school, gender and date
        Parameters:
        year - a String value represents year
        school - a String value represents school
        gender - a String value represents gender
        date - a String value represents date and time
        conn - the Connection Object passed in for sql statement
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of AppUsage Object representing all AppUsage Objects sort by year, school, gender and date

        Parameters:

      • retrieveTimestampAndCategory

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> retrieveTimestampAndCategory(java.util.Date startDate,
                                                                                 java.util.Date endDate,
                                                                                 java.lang.String userMacAddr,
                                                                                 java.lang.String appMacAddr,
                                                                                 java.sql.Connection conn)
        Returns an ArrayList of String concatenated with timestamp and category
        Parameters:
        startDate - a String value represents the start date
        endDate - a String value represents the end date
        userMacAddr - a String represents user's MAC address value
        appMacAddr - a String represents MAC address value of one application usage record
        conn - the Connection Object passed in for sql statement
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of String concatenated with timestamp and category
